values:
Ok guys, this truly is freaky,
my cell literally rang as soon as I read
the last word of this email!!!!!





















I am taking the bait -
what do I have to lose right?



























Hope it works!



























Supposedly The Phone Will Ring
Right After You Do This.



























Just read the little stories and
think of a wish as you scroll all
the way to the bottom. There is
a message there - then make your
wish.
























No attachment on this one.



























Stories



























I'm 13 years old, and I wished
that my dad would come home from
the army, because he'd been having
problems with his heart and right
leg. It was 2:53 p.m . When I made
my wish. At 3:07 p.m. (14 minutes
later), the doorbell rang, and
there my Dad was, luggage and all!!









I'm Katie and I'm 20 and I've been
having trouble in my job and on the
verge of quitting. I made a simple
wish that my boss would get a new
job. That was at 1:35 and at 2:55
there was an announcement that he
was promoted and was leaving for
another city. Believe me...this
really works!!!















My name is Ann and I am 45 years
of age. I had always been single
and had been hoping to get into a
nice, loving relationship for many
years. While kind of daydreaming
(and right after receiving this email)
I wished that a quality person would
finally come into my life. That was at
9:10 AM on a Tuesday. At 9:55 AM
a FedEx delivery man came into my
office.He was cute, polite and
could not stop smiling at me. He
started coming back almost everyday
(even without packages) and asked me
out a week later. We married 6
months later and now have been
happily married for 2 years.



What a great email it was!!



























Just scroll down to the end, but
while you do, think of a wish.
Make your wish when you have completed
scrolling. Whatever age you are, is the
number of minutes it will take for your
wish to come true. ex.you are 25 years
old, it will take 25 minutes for your wish
to come true).



























However, if you don't send this to
people in 5 minutes, you will have bad
luck for years!!



Go for it!!!















SCROLL DOWN!!!!



*



**



***



****



*****



******



*******

STOP!!!



Congratulations!!! Your wish will
now come true in your age minutes.



Now follow this carefully....it
can be very rewarding!!!!



If you repost this within the next 5 min.
something major that you've been wanting
will happen.



Message: This is scary!



The phone will ring right after

Friday- went to school, then walter came home w/ me and at 4 we went to pick up mike from school then picked amber up then went to walters til 5 and then took him to drivers ed then us 3 went to buy movie tickets and then picked walter back up at like 6 and went out to eat at outback and went to see the ring 2(walter made me more scared then the movie) then took mike home then stopped at applebees to drop watler off then me and amber went home.

Saturday- worked all day then went home and got ready and went to mikes party w/ sum people then did a quick run to buy sum stuff and get gas then drove walter and mario to nicks i stayed for only a few cuz then i had to go home.

Sunday- my daddy's birthday!!! woke up, got a nice breakfast and felt like shit, then i took a shower and felt better and then went to work and now im still sitting at work then im going home to celebrate my dads bday.. and who knows what after that!


Fun weekend! I leave for florida on thursday and i really don't wanna go but w/e! hopeuflly everyone won't have too much fun at home and make me jealous while im gone! but im out!

<3Love Always<3 
**HeAtH**

Friday- went to school then to get gas and my hair cut, then to eddies to get him and alex to go to ambers dance competition in southfield. (ooo...and I made poms again lol :-D)

Saturday- woke up went to work came home and ate dinner then went over to walters for the night...that was fun then i got a call from him and i didn't even recognise his voice but i hung up on him. Then made walter call the number back to see if it was really him and they answered hello this is officer then sum name hahaha! ut ohh! It made me think a lot but i know i cant go back to that!

Sunday- woke up went to work then at 2:30 my boss said i could leave and come  back at 5 so i went home and took a nap and got paid. I got two calls from you today and i didn't answer even though maybe i should have but i think its better that i didnt!

Anyways this weekend was fun..but im unhappy about him. I guess i just need to have no contact what so ever w/ him because its just killing me and im trying to move on so hopefully i will keep being over you! 

<3Love Always<3
**HeAtH**

So im really upset...so my mom found out about adam which most of you all know what im talking about! I would think that people wouldn't think about saying things in front of my mom but some people just don't know when to stop. So anyways my mom hasn't confronted me about it yet so i think i am going to talk to her tonite. I'm soo scared i just want things to go back to the way they were! I just want them to give him another chance. He deserves it and no one could ever treat me as well as he does and they just dont' see that. Last night i watched the notebook for the first time and it made me so upset. Its exactly how me and him are. The girls parents don't like him and the guys parents like her and they get split apart for a while. I just wish we could end up like them and have my parents tell me its my choice and for me to do whats best for me...and not what my parents think is best for me! uhhh... i just hope things work out. well im done complaining...wish me luck w/ talking to them!!! I'm Out! <3Love Always<3 **HeAtH**

AHh yea so i haven't updated in forever...not much has went on same old stuff! dance is almost over (disney in like 1 1/2 weeks) then schools almost done i can't wait for it to be over cuz this summer is gonna be the best! i get to go to vegas and disney world and adam moved back to michigan so ill get to spend lots of time w/ him...like always when hes here! but yea today i didn't really do much went to school had my english and spanish final i got a B+ on my english and i duno about spanish yet...then jenn and i went to blockbuster and china queen then to the bank and then we came home. Then adam came over and we watched texas chainsaw massacure...ahh it was sooooo fricken scary then about 2 1/2 hours later he left and jenn and i watched euro trip after i took my daily bubble bath...then i went to sleep for like an hour and a half and now i am just chillin here bout to go get sum dinner w/ just me and my daddy :-D it should be fun we dont' get much time just me and him...yup so just more finals and dance the rest of the week ooo and of course SUMMER yayyyyyy!!! but im out!

**LUV ALWAYS**
HEATH

Intro]
I don't understand why
See it's burning me to hold onto this
I know this is something I gotta do
But that don't mean I want to
What I'm trying to say is that I-love-you I just
I feel like this is coming to an end
And its better for me to let it go now than hold on and hurt you
I gotta let it burn

[Verse 1]
It's gonna burn for me to say this
But it's comin from my heart
It's been a long time coming
But we done been fell apart
Really wanna work this out
But I don't think you're gonna change
I do but you don't
Think it's best we go our separate ways
Tell me why I should stay in this relationship
When I'm hurting baby, I ain't happy baby
Plus theres so many other things I gotta deal with
I think that you should let it burn

[Chorus]
When your feeling ain't the same and your body don't want to
But you know gotta let it go cuz the party ain't jumpin' like it used to
Even though this might bruise you
Let it burn
Let it burn
Gotta let it burn

Deep down you know it's best for yourself but you
Hate the thought of her being with someone else
But you know that it's over
We know that it's through
Let it burn
Let it burn
Gotta let it burn

Sendin' pages I ain't supposed to

I know I made a mistake
Now it's too late
I know she ain't comin back
What I gotta do now
To get my shorty back

Man I don't know what I'm gonna do
Without my booo
You've been gone for too long
It's been fifty-leven days, um-teen hours
Imma be burnin' till you return (let it burn)

[Chorus]
When your feeling ain't the same and your body don't want to
But you know gotta let it go cuz the party ain't jumpin' like it used to
Even though this might bruise you
Let it burn (let it burn, let it burn, you gon'learn)
Let it burn (gotta let it burn)
Gotta let it burn

Deep down you know its best for yourself but you

But you know that it's over
We know that it's through
Let it burn
Let it burn
Gotta let it burn

[Bridge]
I'm twisted cuz one side of me is tellin' me that I need to move on
On the other side I wanna break down and cry (ooooh)

[Breakdown]

hey...i haven't updated in like forever...so everything has been goin pretty good...i guess life kinda sux lately and i am sick of being in a depressed mood...i just wish i had that one person to make me soo happy but i can't so i need to stop trying were nothing more then friends and i need to face reality! so this week i tryed out for poms and made varsity...what else did i do ummm i went to dance school and poms tryouts all week that was about it! today was nicholas' baptism and i am the godmtoher so i had to be in the ceremony and i got the cutest braclet from him the one side says heather and the other side says love nicholas 5-16-04...its soo cute! yup and last nite i went to dinner w/ my grandparents that are in town and then i went and saw 13 goin on 30 w/ katlyn it was soo cute...yup so theres nothing more to say except i am really excited that i am gettin even closer to u :-D...but my life is boring so im out!

**LUV ALWAYS**

i've just been thinking a lot lately and i've been trying to find out who i really am... i think i act different because of who i want to be but u can't always be who u want to be u just need to take who u are for granate! i duno how to fix this...plus i think that i don't have many people i can trust anymore..the people that i kno i can is katlyn and adam they are always there for me and give me the best advice ever and i luv them soo much for that! but is everyone else just become fake to me or is it me thats changing? also i've been thinking a lot about *U* lately...and i don't wana mess up what u have w/ her so i am just gonna have to deal w/ things the way they are and except it! i am really sry if i have messed up nething already but i still do have feelings for u that i need to try and get over them! i want to be urs but i can't be so i just need to face the reality! and i don't regret meeting u at all because u mean soooo much to me u don't even kno..ur always there for me and when i am down u always put the biggest smile on my face and i don't think i have ever thanked u for that! ok so i think i am done w/ this entrie its kinda cheesy i kno but i just wanted to get everything out there! but im out!

**LUV ALWAYS**
HEATH

**LUV ALWAYS**
HEATH

**LUV ALWAYS**
HEATH

yea so this week has been really long cuz i have done the same thing every day...so i think i ended off w/ sunday...

MONDAY~school,dance from 3:30 til 7:15 and got killed on my first day back by a guest teacher that came in then slept

TUESDAY~school,dance from 3 til 6 came come and slept....really sore from monday

WEDNESDAY~school, dance from 4 til 9:30 and then slept...still sore from monday

THURSDAY~school, dance from 3 til 8:15 and on break went shopping at the mall and ate there then came home and slept...still sore from monday

FRIDAY~school, private at dance from 2:45 til 3:15 came home and my old teacher mrs augistine was over to see jenns baby then adam n cj and eric came over to see him thne brittany and her mom then finally liz...then went out to eat w/ my mom dad jenn and nicholas then came home went w/ my dad to get gas and then i am sittin here now wishin i could go out but noone called :-( but hopefully i will get to go out tomorrow nite aww i miss seein adam all the time hes such a sweetheart!! oo yea and adam was handing nicholas to me and he pissed all over his hand and my whole outfit haha neways i am still sore today hopefully it will be gone by tomorrow! but im out nite!

**LUV ALWAYS**
HEATH

SUNDAY- got woken up at 5 unstead of 7:30 like i was supposed to cuz jenn was having bad contractions so they left for the hospital at like 7:15 and andrea and i got ready and left at 8:30 for florida got in at about 4:08 and i got a nefew at 4:02 lol how random...then my grandma and grandpa picked us up and we meet their friends and my great grandma for dinner and it wass really good i got a prime rib and french fries and a salad and rolls then it started to rain so we went back played cards watched finding nemo and went to bed!

MONDAY- it rained so i sat and watched finding nemo then i got ready then watched finding nemo again and then we all went to bells then out to dinner to my favorite place and it was really good i got shrimp and fries and green beans and yea then we went back i took another shower and played cards and went to bed!

TUESDAY- woke up got my bathing suit on went down to the pool for a lil bit then it was cold so i came back up and got ready went out to eat to checkers  yummmy and i got then came home played cards watched finding nemo and went to bed!

WEDNESDAY- woke up went to the pool then it was cold again so i went up and got ready and went to the mall then went out to eat at old world and got shrimp and fries and cake then we meet katlyn half way and andrea and i went down there we stopped and got ice cream then walked the beach (and u can't see ANYTHING cuz theres no lights soo it was soo scary i thought i was gonna get raped) then went back and went to bed!

THURSDAY- woke up early and went on a ship to captiva island and its like a stranded island and the only people on it was our boat so i like 25 people then we stayed there shelled a lil bit and found about 25 whole sand dollars and then took the ship to another island wehre there is a resutant ate there in just my bathing suit lol then took the ship back went and layed at the pool then took a shower and went out to dinner and Mc T's and it was sooo fricken good i ate bread and coconut shrimp and salad and i even tried a oyster it was pretty good but i couldn't swallow it cuz i was laughing soo hard lol then went back katlyn and i went down to the pool in the dark and threw eachother in w/ our clothes on then we just chilled in there for about an hour and had our talks then went back up took a shower together haha then went to bed!
